Articles.Content:
so i made some wings(they animate.. F-14)

but they dont generate any lift,the CFG is properly rconfigured, so what am i missing?
I'd appreciate an answer for this too
Soo i have looked at it, it does generate lift on the wrong axis,though cant figure wich axis it is cuz ksp imports my models orientated wrong

+z is the direction of travel, +x is right, +y is the direction that's left (up in the SPH, 'back' in the VAB).

The part tools may ignore any orientation data on the object they're attached to, so ensure that is 0,0,0 and you only rotate child objects.

+z is the direction of travel, +x is right, +y is the direction that's left (up in the SPH, 'back' in the VAB).

The part tools may ignore any orientation data on the object they're attached to, so ensure that is 0,0,0 and you only rotate child objects.

aha,in this case Z is pointing towards the ground. thanks this is all i needed to know :3
sorry for resurrecting an old post but there is little info on this subject. Could someone clarify the up and down axis in the SPH ? I am not getting any lift on the wings
